activateBid(address,uint256).details: Create an entry in `orderBook` and remove it from `bidPools`.Spam vector attack is mitigated the min amount req., 10min CD + activation fees.

params.user: The user to activate the bid for.

bid(address,uint256,uint256).details: Create an entry in `bidPools`.      Clean the userBidIndex here instead of the `executeBids()` function to save on gas.

params.amount: The amount in asset to bid.
params.pool: To which pool the bid should go.

bidWithStable(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Works the same way as `bid` but performs a swap from the stablecoin to USDO      - if stableAssetId == usdoAssetId, no swap is performed

params.pool: To which pool the bid should go

executeBids(uint256,bytes).details: Should only be called from Singularity.      Singularity should send the `collateralAmountToLiquidate` to this contract before calling this function. Tx will fail if it can't transfer allowed Penrose asset from Singularity.

params.collateralAmountToLiquidate: The amount of collateral to liquidate.
params.swapData: Swap data necessary for swapping USD0 to market asset; necessary only if bidder added USD0

returns.totalAmountExecuted: The amount of asset that was executed.
returns.totalCollateralLiquidated: The amount of collateral that was liquidated.

returns.available: True if there is at least 1 bid available across all the order books.

params.pool: The pool to remove the bid from.
params.user: The user to send the funds to.

bidPools.details: x% premium => bid pool      0 ... 30 range      poolId => totalAmount      poolId => userAddress => userBidInfo.

activateBid(address,uint256).notice: Activate a bid by putting it in the order book.

bid(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add a bid to a bid pool.

bidWithStable(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Add a bid to a bid pool using stablecoins.

executeBids(uint256,bytes).notice: Execute the liquidation call by executing the bids placed in the pools in ASC order.

getBidPoolUserInfo(uint256,address).notice: returns user data for an existing bid pool

getNextAvailBidPool().notice: Get the next not empty bid pool in ASC order.

getOrderBookPoolEntries(uint256).notice: returns an array of 'OrderBookPoolEntry' for a pool

init((uint256,uint256,address,address,ad.notice: Acts as a 'constructor', should be called by a Singularity market.

orderBookEntries(uint256,uint256).notice: The actual order book. Entries are stored only once a bid has been activated

orderBookInfos(uint256).notice: Meta-data about the order book pool

removeBid(address,uint256).notice: Remove a not yet activated bid from the bid pool.

userBidIndexLength(address,uint256).notice: returns number of pool bids for user
